coachProspects.personalizationAnchor: Coaches the U18 state rep team, known for player development focus. Norwood's Easter Classic co-organizer.
coachProspects.draftedIntro:
Hi Jamie,

Seen your U18 team's progression at Norwood — really impressive development trajectory. Heard you're also helping organize the Easter Classic, which is huge.

I'm Michael from CourtLab. We built this for coaches exactly like you who track player improvement seriously. Instead of spiral notebooks or Excel sheets, you get verified shooting stats + film on tap.

Given the scale of your U18 program, might be worth a quick look.

courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael

coachProspects.personalizationAnchor: Leads Hoops & Her women's program (REDARC partnership). Focus on pathways and inclusion for female players.
coachProspects.draftedIntro:
Hi Sarah,

Love what you're doing with Hoops & Her — the focus on creating pathways for female players is exactly what Australian basketball needs.

I'm Michael, founder of CourtLab. We help women's programs track player development without the frustration of outdated tools. Shooting stats, film clips, progress tracking — all built for coaches who care about player growth, not just wins.

Given your focus on pathways and retention, thought it might fit. Happy to show you how it works.

courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael

coachProspects.personalizationAnchor: Oversees Sturt's 'most successful junior program in SA' with multiple players going pro internationally. Recruitment + development pipeline expert.
coachProspects.draftedIntro:
Hi Marcus,

Sturt's pro player pipeline is legendary in SA — seeing graduates compete overseas is incredible.

I'm Michael from CourtLab. We help elite programs give players verified data they can carry through their development journey. Especially useful for recruitment: proven stats + film that follow players to college/pro teams.

With so many Sturt players going places, having portable, verified proof of their development could be a recruiting edge.

Worth exploring? courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael

coachProspects.personalizationAnchor: Runs the Mini 3agles 3v3 program (Term 1 at Wayville). Building foundational skills in fast-paced format. Known for beginner-friendly coaching approach.
coachProspects.draftedIntro:
Hi David,

The Mini 3agles 3v3 format is brilliant for teaching fundamentals — love how you've designed it for beginners to build confidence fast.

I'm Michael, Zane's dad from Forestville. I built CourtLab because junior coaching frustrated me — kids deserve to see their own progress tracked accurately.

For a program like Mini 3agles, being able to show parents/kids measurable improvement in passing, shooting, movement is game-changing. Builds buy-in and keeps kids coming back.

Worth a quick chat? courtlab.app

Cheers,
Michael
